content.html: I’d like to point out that despite all of us knowing that a content moderation council and a Twitter poll is not a wise way of controlling rhetoric and protecting people, I see this behavior a lot in tech. Racism and sexism and all the isms continue because “majority rules.”
content.value:
I’d like to point out that despite all of us knowing that a content moderation council and a Twitter poll is not a wise way of controlling rhetoric and protecting people, I see this behavior a lot in tech. 

Racism and sexism and all the isms continue because “majority rules.”
